hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT ENTY_PNT_CDE, ENTY_PNT_DESC FROM RMS_IND_ENTY_PNT ORDER BY UPPER(ENTY_PNT_DESC)
SELECT ENTY_PNT_CDE, ENTY_PNT_DESC FROM RMS_IND_ENTY_PNT WHERE ENTY_PNT_CDE = :CODE
INSERT INTO RMS_IND_ENTY_PNT ( ENTY_PNT_CDE, ENTY_PNT_DESC, CRET_DTM, CRET_LGN_UID, LST_UPDT_DTM, LST_UPDT_LGN_UID ) VALUES ( :CODE, :DESCRIPTION, :CREATED_DT, :CREATED_BY, :UPDATED_DT, :UPDATED_BY )
UPDATE RMS_IND_ENTY_PNT SET ENTY_PNT_DESC = :DESCRIPTION, LST_UPDT_DTM = :UPDATED_DT, LST_UPDT_LGN_UID = :UPDATED_BY WHERE ENTY_PNT_CDE = :CODE
DELETE FROM RMS_IND_ENTY_PNT WHERE ENTY_PNT_CDE IN (:CODES)
